datastore.IPSearchQuery.description: an ip address that can be attached to a machine

allocationuuid.description: a unique identifier for this ip address allocation, can be used to distinguish between ip address allocation over time.

ipaddress.description: the address (ipv4 or ipv6) of this ip

machineid.description: the machine an ip address is associated to

name.description: the name of the ip address

networkid.description: the network this ip allocate request address belongs to

networkprefix.description: the prefix of the network this ip address belongs to

projectid.description: the project this ip address belongs to, empty if not strong coupled

tags.description: the tags that are assigned to this ip address

type.description: the type of the ip address, ephemeral or static

cidrs.description: the cidr addresses that are allowed to be announced at this switch port

vnis.description: the virtual networks that are exposed at this switch port

image_id.description: the ID of the current image

description.description: a description why this chassis identify LED is in the given state

value.description: the state of this chassis identify LED. empty means LED-OFF

id.description: the unique ID of this entity

name.description: a readable name for this entity
a readable name for this entity

device.description: the device to create the partitions

partitions.description: list of partitions to create on this disk

wipeonreinstall.description: if set to true, this disk will be wiped before reinstallation

gpttype.description: the gpt partition table type of this partition

label.description: optional label for this this partition

number.description: partition number, will be appended to partitionprefix to create the final devicename

size.description: size in mebibytes (MiB) of this partition

createoptions.description: the options to use to create (mkfs) this filesystem

device.description: the underlying device where this filesystem should be created

label.description: optional label for this this filesystem

mountoptions.description: the options to use to mount this filesystem

path.description: the mountpoint where this filesystem should be mounted on

constraints.description: constraints which must match that this layout is taken, if sizes and images are empty these are develop layouts

disks.description: list of disks that belong to this layout

raid.description: list of raid arrays to create

images.description: list of images this layout applies to

sizes.description: list of sizes this layout applies to

constraints.description: constraints which must match that this layout is taken, if sizes and images are empty these are develop layouts

disks.description: list of disks that belong to this layout

networks.description: the networks that this machine will be placed in.

partitionid.description: the partition id to assign this machine to

placement_tags.description: by default machines are spread across the racks inside a partition for every project. if placement tags are provided, the machine candidate has an additional anti-affinity to other machines having the same tags

sizeid.description: the size id to assign this machine to

ssh_pub_keys.description: the public ssh keys to access the machine with

user_data.description: cloud-init.io compatible userdata must be base64 encoded

uuid.description: if this field is set, this specific machine will be allocated if it is not in available state and not currently allocated. this field overrules size and partition

ports.description: the ports affected by this rule

protocol.description: the protocol for the rule, defaults to tcp

to.description: the cidrs affected by this rule

info.description: API to manage and control plane resources like machines, switches, operating system images, machine sizes, networks, IP addresses and more
info.title: metal-api

post.summary: find all audit traces that match given properties
updates a filesystemlayout. if the filesystemlayout was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned

put.summary: create a filesystemlayout. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

post.summary: check if the given machine id satisfies the disk requirements of the filesystemlayout in question
try to detect a filesystemlayout based on given size and image.

delete.summary: deletes an filesystemlayout and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: allocate a firewall
find firewalls by multiple criteria

parameters.description: restrict firmwares to the given machine
parameters.name: machine-id

get.summary: returns all firmwares (for a specific machine)

parameters.description: return health for this specific service only
parameters.name: service

post.summary: updates an image. if the image was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned

put.summary: create an image. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

post.summary: get all images that match given properties

delete.summary: deletes an image and returns the deleted entity

get.summary: query all images which match at least id

post.summary: updates an ip. if the ip was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned
allocate an ip in the given network.
allocate a specific ip in the given network.
get all ips that match given properties
updates a machine. if the machine was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned
allocate a machine

get.summary: get consolepassword for machine by id

post.summary: find machines by multiple criteria
reports IPMI ip addresses leased by a management server for machines
returns machines including the ipmi connection data

get.summary: returns the list of issues that exist in the API

post.summary: returns machine issues
sends a firmware command to the machine

delete.summary: deletes a machine from the database

get.summary: returns a machine including the ipmi connection data

post.summary: boots machine into BIOS

parameters.description: reason why the chassis identify LED has been turned off
parameters.name: description

post.summary: sends a power-off to the chassis identify LED
sends a power-on to the chassis identify LED
sends a power cycle to the machine
boots machine from disk
sends a power-off to the machine
sends a power-on to the machine
boots machine from PXE
sends a reset to the machine
reinstall this machine
set the state of a machine
updates a network. if the network was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned

put.summary: create a network. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

post.summary: allocates a child network from a partition's private super network
get all networks that match given properties
free a network

delete.summary: deletes a network and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: updates a Partition. if the Partition was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned

put.summary: create a Partition. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

post.summary: get partition capacity

delete.summary: deletes a Partition and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: update a project. optimistic lock error can occur.

put.summary: create a project. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

post.summary: get all projects that match given properties

delete.summary: deletes a project and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: updates a size. if the size was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned

put.summary: create a size. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

post.summary: updates a sizeimageconstraint. if the sizeimageconstraint was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned

put.summary: create a sizeimageconstraint. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

post.summary: try if the given combination of image and size is supported and possible to allocate

delete.summary: deletes an sizeimageconstraint and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: get all size reservations
from a given machine id returns the appropriate size

delete.summary: deletes an size and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: updates a switch. if the switch was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned
get all switches that match given properties
register a switch

delete.summary: deletes an switch and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: notify the metal-api about a configuration change of a switch
toggles the port of the switch with a nicname to the given state
update a tenant. optimistic lock error can occur.

put.summary: create a tenant. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

post.summary: get all tenants that match given properties

delete.summary: deletes a tenant and returns the deleted entity

get.summary: extract the connecting user from auth header
returns the current version information of this module

post.summary: create auth key to connect to project's VPN

HMAC.description: Generate a 'Authorization: Metal xxxx' header where 'xxxx' is a HMAC generated by the request-date, the request-method and the body
HMAC.name: Authorization

jwt.description: Add a 'Authorization: Bearer xxxx' header to the request where 'xxxx' is the OIDC token retrieved from the identity provider's authentication endpoint
jwt.name: Authorization
